titleStmt.title: Gods handy-vvorke in vvonders Miraculously shewen vpon two women, lately deliuered of two monsters: with a most strange and terrible earth-quake, by which, fields and other grounds, were quite remoued to other places: the prodigious births, being at a place called Perre-farme, within a quarter of a mile of Feuersham in Kent, the 25. of Iuly last, being S. Iames his day. 1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Purslowe] for I. W[right],

notesStmt.note: The earthquake described occurred 1 March 1615 (o.s.) in Vaud canton, Switzerland.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
